Action.author: devin-fisher
Action.body: @vladimir.shishkin Looking at the ticket, it looks like you are running nsreplay in an environment where indy-node and indy-plenum is not available. nsreplay must be run in an environment with indy-node and indy-plenum. Typically, nsreplay would be run an development environment for indy-node.

Action.author: devin-fisher
Action.body: I understand the problem better. I'll be fixing this now.
